channel.title: CVE Feed for Crafter Software -- Crafter CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Crafter Software -- Crafter CMS

item.title: CVE-2021-23261|2024-09-17T01:57:02.067Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Authenticated administrators may override the system configuration file and cause a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2020-25802|2024-09-17T03:07:43.126Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources vulnerability in Crafter Studio of Crafter CMS allows authenticated developers to execute OS commands via Groovy scripting. This issue affects: Crafter Software Crafter CMS 3.0 versions prior to 3.0.27; 3.1 versions prior to 3.1.7.
